about_the_game:
This is the demo of Examinations Chambers. It includes the first eight rooms of the full game.

In this short narrative puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles.



Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on the corresponding buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.



Playtime on your first run may be around 15-20 Minutes. In succeeding playthroughs, you can challenge yourself with proceeding through the game as fast as possible and even enjoy the party mode.



Convert small cubes to a big cube and the other way around, place the cubes on the correct buttons to figure out the challenges.



Have fun!

name: Examination Chambers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700k
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: This is the demo. In this short narrative puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles. Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
